visual.name: Acterys Gantt V1.1.4
visual.description: Acterys Gannt enables you to display and directly edit Gantt charts including tasks and groupings, start/end times, progress indicator and resources.

Acterys Gantt

 

Acterys Gantt enables comprehensive project management functionality in Power BI.

Features:

  • Gantt display of tasks on multiple hierarchy levels and task groupings
  • Adding and editing of tasks stored in a supported data source (e.g. SQL Server and any data source supported by Acterys)
  • Editing completion progress
  • Managing resources assigned to tasks

Visual Configuration Details:

Acterys Wiki

Acterys YouTube Channel

Important:

This visual requires an Acterys Subscription.
Please start a free trial here: https://www.acterys.com/start-your-trial/

Find a Partner near you:

 www.acterys.com
